ability.Material Gain: Gains 1 Material at the end of each turn. Each Material increases the power of its moves by 10%.
ability.Clear Body: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

Infinity Cannon.effect: The user gains 1 Material after using this move.

Dragon Pulse.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Thunder Charge.effect: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

Barrier Break.effect: This move ignores the stat change of the target's Special Defense during the attack.
